Actions.Name: Great Holy
Effects: Allies in the area gain 3 vigor.

Actions.Name: Denial
Actions.Description: A foe in range must save or become unable to attack until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take 2 damage and are sealed instead.

Actions.Name: Gust
Actions.Description: The [name] or an ally in range may fly 2.

Actions.Name: Blessed Ground
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a space of Blessed Ground in range. The [name] and allies have resistance and deal bonus damage while inside. The spaces disappear if the [name] is defeated, and it may have a maximum of four, choosing which to keep and end.

Actions.Name: Immaculate
Actions.Description: An ally in range 5 becomes Intangible until the end of its next turn.
